description: The two nations had expelled each other's envoys over a historical dispute dating back a century.
title: Serbia rescinds Montenegro ambassador expulsion
title_page: Serbia rescinds Montenegro ambassador expulsion - BBC News
maintext: The 1918 assembly ruled that Montenegro would become part of the Kingdom of Serbs, Croats and Slovenes, which was later known as Yugoslavia. In 2006, Montenegro declared independence, becoming a sovereign state for the first time since the end of the First World War.
